mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TB_XUSERS(userid, rnum, passwd1, passwd2, custnm, pernm, useyn, password, role, custcd, spjangcd, username, actcd, actnm, saupnum, flag, phone ) VALUES (#{userid},#{rnum}, #{passwd1}, #{passwd2}, #{custnm}, #{pernm}, #{useyn}, #{password}, #{role}, #{custcd}, #{spjangcd}, #{username}, #{actcd}, #{actnm}, #{saupnum}, #{flag}, #{phone})
